newsitem.title: FRANCE: BIC sets two-for-one stock split.
newsitem.headline: BIC sets two-for-one stock split.

text.p: French pen and lighter maker BIC said on Tuesday it proposed a two-for-one stock split in July that would raise the number of BIC shares to 55,296,000.
BIC said in a statement it would halve the nominal value of the shares to 25 francs from 50. It said the new shares would be retroactive to January 1 and have rights to the 1997 dividend.
BIC said its board would propose the stock split at an extraordinary shareholders meeting.
